ygData.subject: Re: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: if it was only one person I could understand that ... but now it seems like everyone is doing it... I remember back when BBS where around (not this stuff) and
ygData.messageBody:
if it was only one person I could understand that ... but now it seems like
everyone is doing it... I remember back when BBS where around (not this
stuff) and I used my C 64 to get on it.... now that was some time ago...

Jaxim
(who really is starting to feel is advanced age of 25 *grin*)




>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Weapons
>Date: Tue, 29 Jun 1999 17:27:34 -0400
>
>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
>i just say kewl like that because it's sort of a trade mark for me....ever
>since
>i was on local bbs's, i've been writing that way...heh just me i
>guess.....:P
>
>I.G wrote:
>
> > From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
> >
> > ok I am not writing this to bash any one person or anything but...
> >
> > what the hell is up with the damn kewl shit??? what we cant spell any
>more?
> > I admit I have trouble spelling at times but this just really looks
>stupid!
> >
> > maybe I am just getting old or something.
> >
> > Jaxim
> >
> > >From: "Kris Becan" <phonic@...>
> > >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> > >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Weapons
> > >Date: Mon, 28 Jun 1999 14:49:57 -0500
> > >
> > >Ok guys I know I may be going off on the weapons here but my thought is
> > >that there are no really kewl Cleric only weapons in the game. I know
>this
> > >is ranting but hear me out. I know we aren't fighters but we are
>defensive
> > >players in the game. Why not give us a few defensive weapons. Weapons
>with
> > >random charges of some type of defensive spell. I know ya'll will all
>say
> > >well what about the screaming mace? Blah it does a whole lot of good
>for
> > >you when your not even supposed to be tanking right? Anyway, why not
>have
> > >that cast as an area affect yaulp? That would be much kewler and much
>more
> > >beneficial to the group. What do all of ya'll think about something
>like
> > >that? I'm not saying that the clerics in general are unbalanced in the
>game
> > >but what I'm saying is there are weapons that are class specific to
>most
> > >other classes but the clerics. Please give me your feedback. Please
>feel
> > >free to rant right back at me to... just don't be too harsh! :)
> > >
> > >**********************
> > >Human Cleric
> > >Ramsess De'Vizier
> > >Rallos Zek
> > >**********************
